alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:17PM CDT until May 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Polk County in central Iowa... Northeastern Madison County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Dallas County in central Iowa... Northwestern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1217 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Patterson, or 8 miles east of Winterset, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Badger Creek State Park around 1235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cumming, West Des Moines, Clive, Norwalk, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Jordan Creek Town Center and Walnut Woods State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 58 and 72. Interstate 80 between mile markers 117 and 124. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
